name: Yorlde Liandry's Torment

This item enhances your abilities with a damage-over-time effect that scales off the target’s health, allowing you to wear down tanky opponents over an extended skirmish.
Periodically, the torment detonates for a burst of true damage to finish off weakened foes.
— Perfect for mages who want to drag out engagements, shred through frontline tanks, and execute them with true damage.
